Localization.Name: Year of the Rat Lantern Display
Localization.Description: Celebrate Red Festival in style with this eye-catching homage to traditional lanterns. Giving off a warm and inviting light, this beautiful lantern sits within a large, intricately carved circular frame adorned with a rat in honor of 2956.
